div.head: CHAP. CXXXIV.
An exhortation to blesse God.
div.ab: [A song of degrees.] Beholde, blesse yee the Lord, all yee seruants of the Lord: which by night stand in the house of the Lord.
Lift vp your hands in the Sanctuary: & blesse the Lord. Or, in holinesse.
The Lord that made heauen and earth: blesse thee out of Zion.
